fm: TreeNode *sortedListToBST(ListNode *head) {     if (NULL == head) {       return NULL;     }      ListNode *curr = head;     ListNode *next = head;     ListNode *prev = NULL;      while (next != NULL) {       // 通过走一步／两步找到中间节点       next = next->next;        if (NULL == next) {         break;       }        next = next->next;       prev = curr;       curr = curr->next;     }      if (NULL == curr) {       return new TreeNode(head->val);     }     else {       TreeNode *root = new TreeNode(curr->val);        // 把链表拆成两端递归       if (prev != NULL) {         prev->next = NULL;         root->left = sortedListToBST(head);       }        root->right = sortedListToBST(curr->next);        return root;     }   }
fc: class Solution { public:   TreeNode *sortedListToBST(ListNode *head) {     if (NULL == head) {       return NULL;     }      ListNode *curr = head;     ListNode *next = head;     ListNode *prev = NULL;      while (next != NULL) {       // 通过走一步／两步找到中间节点       next = next->next;        if (NULL == next) {         break;       }        next = next->next;       prev = curr;       curr = curr->next;     }      if (NULL == curr) {       return new TreeNode(head->val);     }     else {       TreeNode *root = new TreeNode(curr->val);        // 把链表拆成两端递归       if (prev != NULL) {         prev->next = NULL;         root->left = sortedListToBST(head);       }        root->right = sortedListToBST(curr->next);        return root;     }   } };
